Issue.creator: wlahti
Issue.summary: Channel participation does not correctly report cluster status/relation after removing consenter (when system channel exists)
Issue.description: When the channel participation API is used to list the details for an application channel where the orderer has been removed from the consenters set when the system channel exists, an incorrect cluster status/relation of active/member is returned by the API. It should return inactive/config-tracker at this point.
